intent_atoms.description: Export plaintext integrity issues via CLI and app UI
Document export pathways in manuals and README feature matrix
Plaintext exporter formatting behavior passes PlaintextIssueSummaryExporterTests
CLI help text includes new export commands as verified by ISOInspectorCLIScaffoldTests/testHelpTextMentionsExportCommands
Project status trackers must reflect task completion and remove from active queue
Shared exporter implementation used for both CLI and app

functional_units.name: Plaintext Integrity Issue Exporter

functional_units.name: CLI Export Command Integration
functional_units.description: Adds toolbar buttons and command menu entries for exporting plaintext issues in the command-line interface

functional_units.name: App Manual Documentation Update
